name: Beware of the Binturong! Trivia Game | Wild Mammals | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what setting does the binturong live?
questions.explanation:
In trees.

	The binturong is an arboreal animal meaning that it lives in trees.

black.

	A binturong has thick white whiskers and a long muscular tail. It uses its paws to walk up and down trees and when walking on ground it walks flat-footed.

questions.text: A prehensile tail on a binturong enables the animal to grasp onto things.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The binturong uses its tail to hold itself in place on a tree while it's sleeping so it won't fall.

Southeast Asia.

	The binturongs live in the sub-tropical forests of Southeast Asia. Because of the destruction of the tropical forests, binturongs are rare.

True.

	Binturongs in zoos eat moving prey, plants, carrots, cooked sweet potatoes and melon among other foods.

Yes.

	Binturongs are very playful in the water.

questions.text: Binturongs can't see well so they use whiskers to find their way around.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Binturongs have good vision and hearing as well as a keen sense of smell.

questions.text: What odor do binturongs give off?
questions.explanation:
Buttered popcorn.

	Binturongs mark their territory by leaving a musky substance as they walk. The animal will make grunts or hissing noises as it walks.

questions.text: Binturongs only hunt during the day.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Even though binturongs lay out in the sun on branches, they hunt during the night.

leaping on them.

	The soap opera 'Days Of Our Lives' had a two-day storyline with Jack and Jennifer Deveraux (Matthew Ashford, Melissa Reeves) that involved a binturong loose in their home.
